CustomField.description: When you choose 'Rolling,' the system will generate Rate Calculator Lines for each Employment Cost Item found within the Effective and Expiry dates of the Rate Calculator. However, if you select 'Fixed,' all Rate Calculator Lines will use the most recent Employment Cost Item created for this Employment Cost.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When you choose 'Rolling,' the system will generate Rate Calculator Lines for each Employment Cost Item found within the Effective and Expiry dates of the Rate Calculator. However, if you select 'Fixed,' all Rate Calculator Lines will use the most recent Employment Cost Item created for this Employment Cost.
CustomField.label: Assignment Handling
